abstract.para: This is reference documentation for all user-configurable parameters in the DocBook XSL Slides FO stylesheet (for generating PDF slide presentations). Note that the Slides stylesheet for FO output is a customization layer of the DocBook XSL FO stylesheet. Therefore, in addition to the slides-specific parameters listed in this section, you can also use a number of FO stylesheet parameters to control Slides FO output.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies unitless font size to use for foil titles

refsynopsisdiv.programlisting: <xsl:param name="foil.title.master">36</xsl:param> <!-- Inconsistant use of point size? -->

refsection.para: Specifies a unitless font size to use for foil titles; used in combination with the foil.title.size parameter.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies font size to use for foil titles, including units

refsection.para: This parameter combines the value of the foil.title.master parameter with a unit specification. The default unit is pt (points).

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies whether copyright is generated

refsection.para: This parameter specifies whether the copyright info is generated in the footer area.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies whether foilgroups have a numbered TOC

refsection.para: If TOC generation is turned on, this parameter specifies whether foilgroups have a numbered TOC. If disabled, TOC items will be bulleted, not numbered.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies whether foilgroups have a TOC

refsection.para: This parameter specifies whether foilgroups will contain a table of contents of the included foils.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies whether handoutnotes are generated

refsection.para: This parameter specifies whether handoutnotes shall be generated to the output.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies whether page numbers are generated

refsection.para: This parameter specifies how page numbers are generated in the footer area.

listitem.para: No page numbers generated at all.
Current page number, a slash and the total number of pages
No page numbers generated at all.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies whether the pubdate is generated

refsection.para: This parameter specifies whether the publication date is generated in the footer area.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies whether speakernotes are generated

refsection.para: This parameter specifies whether speakernotes shall be generated to the output.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies whether titlepage is generated

refsection.para: This parameter specifies whether titlepage is generated for the presentation.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies how inline MathML is processed

refsection.para: This parameter specifies how inline MathML formulas are embedded into the output document.

listitem.para: Content is copied over inline with its namespace.
Content is extracted into an externel file and referenced by an external-graphic element.
Content is copied over with its namespace inside an instream-foreign-object element.

refsection.para: Specifies the font family to use for slides titles.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies how inline SVG is processed

refsection.para: This parameter specifies how inline SVG graphics are embedded into the output document.

listitem.para: Content is copied over inline with its namespace.
Content is extracted into an externel file and referenced by an external-graphic element.
Content is copied over with its namespace inside an instream-foreign-object element.
